item.title: Jio phones Know how to prebook Jio phones for testing
item.description: Jio is starting pre-booking of their smartphones. It is expected that jio will start delievering their smartphones from 15 August onwards. Itâ€™s a Book first Get first scheme. Registration form is available on their official website.

item.title: Flipkart introduced voice search in their PWA
item.description:
Flipkart was fast to introduce their PWA aka Progressive Web App and now they have introduced Voice Search in their web app. Now you have to just tap the voice icon and start speaking what you want. It makes the whole process fast and easier. Instead of typing some query words you now just have to say those words.

Flipkart was fast to introduce their PWA aka Progressive Web App and now they have introduced Voice Search in their web app. Now you have to just tap the voice icon and start speaking what you want. It makes the whole process fast and easier. Instead of typing some query words you now just have to say those words.
